root.name: Dink Smallwood
root.description: PremiseDink Smallwood is a pig farmer who becomes an adventurer after losing his mother in a mysterious fire. After this he leaves town to live with his aunt, but during his travels discovers a sinister group known as the cast and hears murmurs of an ancient evil.MechanicsThe game is an action RPG. As the character levels up he can improve his attack, defence, or magic. Potions can also be discovered that increase stats as well. The player can purchase weapons and usable items that bear similarity to games such as Zelda. It mostly focuses on exploration and combat.AvailibilityDink Smallwood is available for download from Robinson Technologies' website.
